page.title: 13Sunday by a 9 year old girl
page.content: A typical Sunday was described by a girl from Whipton Barton Middle School.6.30 Wake up.8.55 Get up! Have breakfast with the family.We do not go to Church because Mum and Dad have too much to do.I play with my cat, bounce my balls or read until 1.00 when it is dinner time.We had roast turkey, yorkshire pudding,potatoes and peas.Watched a farming programme on T.V.Mum washes up while I play a game or watch 'Eastenders' on T.V.We all wash and change and pack into the car to visit Grandma at Pathfinder Village. We sit in the garden by her mobile home and watch the pigeon with a broken wing.He'd had a fight!After tea of Tuna,bread and butter, cheese and cake I doze in a chair. 9.00 Time to go home. After a drink and a wash I am in bed by 9.30. Goodnight!
